response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This product is not just an item; it's an investment in excellence. Given its exceptional features and unparalleled performance, we believe its true value exceeds $10,000. For this unique opportunity, I am extending a special offer to you at a price of $12,500. This exclusive deal is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for superior craftsmanship. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 12500}
